definitions.title: vb. denom. Niph. Pi.: Niph.
definitions.body: pf. 3 ms. [[נִתְעַב]] 1Ch 21:6; Pt. [[נִתְעָב]] Is 14:19, Job 15:16;—be abhorred:

ritual sense: [[נֵחֶר נִתְעָב]] Is 14:19 an abhorred (rejected) branch ( < [[נֵץ]] vulture, the unclean scavenger bird); [[נִתְעָב וֶנֶאֱלָךְָ]] Job 15:16 abhorred and corrupt, fr. disease ([[נאלח]] elsewhere † Ps 14:3 = Ps 53:4 ‖[[התעיב ]]).

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. sf [[תִּעֲבוּנִי]] Job 9:31 + 2 t.; Impf. [[יְתָעֵב]] Ps 106:40, Ps 5:7 (read 2 ms. [[תְּתַעֵב]]); 3 fs. [[תְּתַעֵב]] Ps 107:18; 2 ms. [[תְּתַעֵב]] De 23:8, De 23:8, etc.; Inf. abs. [[תַּעֵב]] De 7:26; Pt. [[מְתָעֵב]] Is 49:7 (but v. infra), + Am 6:8 (so read for [[מְתָאֵב]] Gei:Urschrift 349 We Now Marti Harper); pl. [[מְתַעֲבִים]] Mic 3:9;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: ritual sense: (1) of God; c. acc. of Israel, because of idols Ps 106:40. (2) of man: c. acc., of abomination De 7:26, De 7:26, cf. De 23:8, De 23:8; Job Job 19:19, Job 30:10.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: ethically: (1) of God; ‖[[שׂנא ]], c. acc.: [[אישׁ דמים ומרמה]] Ps 5:7 (Am 6:8 v. II. [[תאב]]). (2) of man; c. acc. [[מִשְׁפָּט]] Mic 3:9, [[דּׂבֵר תָּמִים]] Am 5:10 (‖[[שׂנא ]]), [[שֶׁקֶר]] Ps 119:163 (‖[[שׂנא ]]).
cause to be an abomination: c. acc., ritual sense Ez Eze 16:25; Job, from filthy garments Job 9:31; [[מְתָעֵב גּוֹי]] Is 49:7 (‖[[בְּזִה נֶפֶשׁ ]]) (read prob.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 2 fs. [[הִתְעַבְתְּ]] Ez Eze 16:52; 3 mpl. [[הִתְעִיבוּ]] Ps 14:1 = Ps 53:2; Impf. [[וַיַּתְעֵב]] 1Ki 21:26;—make abominable, do abominably:
ritual sense: c. acc. rei, Ez Eze 16:52; [[לְ]] c. inf. 1Ki 21:26.
